verses.verse: וַיָּ֕שָׁב <WH7725> with me came again הַמַּלְאָ֖ךְ <WH4397> And the angel הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֑י וַיְעִירֵ֕נִי <WH5782> and waked כְּאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> me as a man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יֵע֥וֹר <WH5782> that is wakened מִשְּׁנָתֽוֹ׃ <WH8142> out of his sleep

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> I רֹאֶ֑ה <WH7200> unto me What seest [וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹמַ֡ר <WH559> said ק) רָאִ֣יתִי ׀ <WH7200> I have looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold מְנוֹרַת֩ <WH4501> and behold a candlestick זָהָ֨ב <WH2091> all [of] gold כֻּלָּ֜הּ <WH3605> all וְגֻלָּ֣הּ <WH1543> bowl עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשָׁ֗הּ <WH7218> upon the top וְשִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> of it and his seven נֵרֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5216> lamps עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> on שִׁבְעָ֤ה <WH7651> thereon and seven וְשִׁבְעָה֙ <WH7651> to the seven מֽוּצָק֔וֹת <WH4166> pipes לַנֵּר֖וֹת <WH5216> lamps אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> are on רֹאשָֽׁהּ׃ <WH7218> which [are] upon the top

וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> And two זֵיתִ֖ים <WH2132> olive trees עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> and אֶחָד֙ <WH259> by it one מִימִ֣ין <WH3225> upon the right הַגֻּלָּ֔ה <WH1543> [side] of the bowl וְאֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and the other עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂמֹאלָֽהּ׃ <WH8040> upon the left

וָאַ֙עַן֙ <WH6030> So I answered וָֽאֹמַ֔ר <WH559> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּלְאָ֛ךְ <WH4397> to the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> that talked בִּ֖י לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> with me saying מָה־ <WH4100> What אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> are these אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> master

וַ֠יַּעַן <WH6030> with me answered הַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <WH4397> Then the angel הַדֹּבֵ֥ר <WH1696> that talked בִּי֙ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> No יָדַ֖עְתָּ <WH3045> unto me Knowest מָה־ <WH4100> what הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> thou not what these be? And I said לֹ֥א <WH3808> No אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> No my lord

וַיַּ֜עַן <WH6030> Then he answered וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and spake אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto me saying זֶ֚ה <WH2088> This דְּבַר־ <WH1697> This [is] the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <WH2216> unto Zerubbabel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor בְחַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> Not by might וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor בְכֹ֔חַ <WH3581> nor by power כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but בְּרוּחִ֔י <WH7307> but by my spirit אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

מִֽי־ <WH4310> What אַתָּ֧ה <WH859> you הַֽר־ <WH2022> hill הַגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> Who [art] thou O great לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> accept זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <WH2216> Zerubbabel לְמִישֹׁ֑ר <WH4334> [thou shalt become] a plain וְהוֹצִיא֙ <WH3318> and he shall bring forth אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶ֣בֶן <WH68> stone הָרֹאשָׁ֔ה <WH7222> the top תְּשֻׁא֕וֹת <WH8663> [thereof with] shoutings חֵ֥ן <WH2580> [crying] Grace חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace לָֽהּ׃ פ
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> The hands זְרֻבָּבֶ֗ל <WH2216> of Zerubbabel יִסְּד֛וּ <WH3248> foundation הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> of this house הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this וְיָדָ֣יו <WH3027> his hands תְּבַצַּ֑עְנָה <WH1214> shall also finish וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <WH3045> it and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> that the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <WH7971> hath sent אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For מִ֣י <WH4310> who בַז֮ <WH937> contempt לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> the day קְטַנּוֹת֒ <WH6996> of small וְשָׂמְח֗וּ <WH8055> will be glad וְרָא֞וּ <WH7200> and shall see אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֶ֧בֶן <WH68> stones הַבְּדִ֛יל <WH913> plummet בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> in the hand זְרֻבָּבֶ֖ל <WH2216> of Zerubbabel שִׁבְעָה־ <WH7651> [with] those seven אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> another עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> they [are] the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> which מְשׁוֹטְטִ֖ים <WH7751> which run to and fro בְּכָל־ <WH3605> throughout הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> through the whole earth

וָאַ֖עַן <WH6030> Then answered וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> I and said אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him מַה־ <WH4100> What שְּׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> unto him What [are] these two הַזֵּיתִים֙ <WH2132> olive trees הָאֵ֔לֶה <WH428> are these עַל־ <WH5921> on יְמִ֥ין <WH3225> upon the right הַמְּנוֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> [side] of the candlestick וְעַל־ <WH5921> and upon שְׂמֹאולָֽהּ׃ <WH8040> and upon the left

וָאַ֣עַן <WH6030> And I answered שֵׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> again וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him מַה־ <WH4100> What שְׁתֵּ֞י <WH8147> unto him What [be these] two שִׁבֲּלֵ֣י <WH7641> branches הַזֵּיתִ֗ים <WH2132> olive אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בְּיַ֗ד <WH3027> which through שְׁנֵי֙ <WH8147> the two צַנְתְּר֣וֹת <WH6804> pipes הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> golden הַֽמְרִיקִ֥ים <WH7324> empty מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and הַזָּהָֽב׃ <WH2091> the golden

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And he answered אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> me and said הֲל֥וֹא <WH3808> No יָדַ֖עְתָּ <WH3045> Knowest מָה־ <WH4100> what אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וָאֹמַ֖ר <WH559> thou not what these [be]? And I said לֹ֥א <WH3808> No אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <WH113> No my lord

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> he These [are] the two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ones הַיִּצְהָ֑ר <WH3323> anointed הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> that stand עַל־ <WH5921> by אֲד֥וֹן <WH113> by the Lord כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the whole earth
